properties.name: value
properties.description: Data for displaying table. We can add the filtering functionality by adding slots with key value. Also we can customize each cell by adding slots.

subProperty.name: key
subProperty.description: This indicates what values should be shown from the Object array in the column

subProperty.name: prefix
subProperty.description: Prefix of the cell in the current column

subProperty.name: suffix
subProperty.description: Suffix of the cell in the current column

subProperty.name: filter
subProperty.description: Filter function of the cell in the current column

properties.name: identifierField
properties.description: Field which is identifier for emit data from pickup event

properties.name: pageSize
properties.description: Number of items in one page

properties.name: current
properties.description: Page Number of the current page

properties.name: paginationMinimal
properties.description: Provide only basic pagination component without additional setting, works only when pagination is tun on

properties.name: mobileFooter
properties.description: Responsible for displaying mobile footer with loader when 'mobileLoader' turn on

events.name: update:page
events.description: Emitted when the page is changed

events.name: pickup
events.description: Emitted when click on record, will emit current record data or identifier data with index on current page.

slots.name: cell-{key}
slots.description: We can customize the cell in the columns with this slot. So please use the key props in header in order to indicate which columns should be customized

slots.name: filter-{key}
slots.description: We can add the filter at the top of each row using this slot. So please use the key props i header props.
